Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to unauthorized depictions of public officials generated by artificial intelligence
Summary: Requires the owner, licensee or operator of a visual or audio generative artificial intelligence system to take steps to prohibit its users from creating unauthorized realistic depictions of public officials.
LawCode: Add ยง390-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to unauthorized depictions of public officials generated by artificial intelligence
